Headline: Brown Line Delays
ShortDescription: Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at Sedgwick. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at Sedgwick. 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
